sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,TRACT_ERR_NAME ,SUBINFO_NAME ,SIGNIN_ERR_NAME ,SUB_ERR_NAME ,ERR_NAME ,DOWNLOAD_URL ,CREATE_TIME ,BATCH_ID ,FILE_TYPE FROM IMPORT_RECORD WHERE 1=1 AND IMPORT_RECORD.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TRACT_ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#tract_err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUBINFO_NAME) Like '%'||(#subinfo_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGNIN_ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#signin_err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#sub_err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DOWNLOAD_URL) Like '%'||(#download_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_ID) Like '%'||(#batch_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FILE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#file_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM IMPORT_RECORD WHERE 1=1 AND IMPORT_RECORD.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TRACT_ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#tract_err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUBINFO_NAME) Like '%'||(#subinfo_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGNIN_ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#signin_err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#sub_err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ERR_NAME) Like '%'||(#err_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DOWNLOAD_URL) Like '%'||(#download_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_ID) Like '%'||(#batch_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FILE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#file_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
